title: Flights & Flatbread with Coquerel Wines
description:
Join us on Tuesday, March 12, from 4â€“8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for an evening of Flights & Flatbread featuring the exceptional wines of Coquerel Wines. Hosted by Coquerel Director of Sales, Stacey Pytlewski, this tasting showcases a diverse selection of Napa Valley wines alongside a delicious flatbread pairing.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Includes a flatbread and a tasting of four Coquerel wines!)

Featured Wines:

  • ğŸ· 2021 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon â€“ A bold, structured red with dark berries, soft tannins, and a long cherry finish.
  • ğŸ· 2021 Cabernet Franc â€˜Bennettâ€™s Vineyardâ€™ â€“ Rich and aromatic, with cassis, dark berries, and a hint of black pepper.
  • ğŸ· 2020 Coquerel Notre CuvÃ©e â€“ A full-bodied, concentrated blend with notes of violets, sweet currants, and spice.
  • ğŸ· 2024 Le Petit Sauvignon Blanc â€“ Bright and refreshing, with grapefruit, guava, and pineapple flavors.


Discover the elegance of Coquerel Wines, located in the heart of Calistoga, Napa Valley, and learn about their winemaking philosophy while enjoying an expertly paired flatbread.

Reserve your spot and indulge in this unforgettable tasting experience!
